meaningMnemonic: 誕生日 is <kanji>birthday</kanji>. おめでとう is like "congratulations." So, congratulations for your birthday is like <vocabulary>happy birthday</vocabulary>!
primaryReading: おたんじょうびおめでとう
readingMnemonic: The reading is the same as 誕生日, so if you know that you know this!

readingAudio.reading: おたんじょうびおめでとう
